name: Repair And Go!
description:
Concept - Inside of the machine a Nano-robot have a hard mission of to repair your host, a heavy machine, to survive and goal at center of command. In to middle this, he is attacked by internal systems of defense in state of high alert.

Mission - Repair the host machine before everything blows up, without being catch for defense system.

Mechanics - The player move with the arrows and interact to open the door, he must use the scenery to hide and escape from the defense bot.

---

Improvements for the future Tweaks: tidying up the sound | enhance animation Interaction: feedbacks for: 1 defense robot activation, 2 door opening delay. interface: Add robot defense position indicator and auto destruction counter.

---
